title: Capability tier promoted to 0.3.0-alpha
summary: Promoted runtime metadata to 0.3.0-alpha to reflect the new capability tier and clarified architecture, authentication, and admin surfaces.
description: Documented the separation of web surfaces into distinct repositories, domain-based OAuth boundaries, central authentication services, tier scaffolding, and the reaffirmed runtime authority model without changing runtime execution behavior.

architecture: Separated web surfaces into distinct repositories.
authentication_and_accounts: Central Auth API with OAuth providers (Google, GitHub, Discord).
Account model with roles and session-based auth.
authorization_and_tiers: Tier scaffolding for OPEN, GOLD, and PRO.
tooling_and_admin: WinForms Desktop Admin runtime service control.
Local orchestration for Auth API and tunnels.
clarity: Runtime reaffirmed as the authoritative source of truth.
Web surfaces consume exported metadata only.

title: Architecture and authority clarified
description: Documented the two-repository architecture with the runtime as the sole authority, WinForms Desktop Admin as the privileged local control plane, the web dashboard as a read-only downstream consumer, and ongoing path configuration groundwork without changing runtime execution behavior.

title: Alpha metadata refresh
description: Version metadata promoted to v0.2.2-alpha with build 2025.03 while preserving the existing runtime changelog history.

title: Project suspended
description: StreamSuites runtime development was indefinitely suspended due to unresolved external platform instability and non-deterministic ingestion behavior.

title: Chat replay scaffolding exported
description: Introduced the chat_replay service with export-safe HTML window and OBS overlay surfaces backed by the schema-defined replay message model; all surfaces remain static, mock-data driven, and non-interactive until runtime ingestion is wired.

title: Quota enforcement hardened
description: Daily quota enforcement was stabilized across platforms, consolidating the QuotaRegistry and keeping snapshot exports aligned for downstream readers.
